00036 #include "MEM_guardedalloc.h"

00038 #include "BLI_utildefines.h"
00039 #include "BLI_rand.h"
00040 #include "BLI_ghash.h"

00042 #include "DNA_scene_types.h"
00043 #include "DNA_meshdata_types.h"

00054 static void initData(ModifierData *md)
00055 {
00056     BuildModifierData *bmd = (BuildModifierData*) md;
00057 
00058     bmd->start = 1.0;
00059     bmd->length = 100.0;
00060 }
00061 
00062 static void copyData(ModifierData *md, ModifierData *target)
00063 {
00064     BuildModifierData *bmd = (BuildModifierData*) md;
00065     BuildModifierData *tbmd = (BuildModifierData*) target;
00066 
00067     tbmd->start = bmd->start;
00068     tbmd->length = bmd->length;
00069     tbmd->randomize = bmd->randomize;
00070     tbmd->seed = bmd->seed;
00071 }
00072 
00073 static int dependsOnTime(ModifierData *UNUSED(md))
00074 {
00075     return 1;
00076 }
00077 
00078 static DerivedMesh *applyModifier(ModifierData *md, Object *UNUSED(ob),
00079                                   DerivedMesh *derivedData,
00080                                   int UNUSED(useRenderParams),
00081                                   int UNUSED(isFinalCalc))
00082 {
00083     DerivedMesh *dm = derivedData;
00084     DerivedMesh *result;
00085     BuildModifierData *bmd = (BuildModifierData*) md;
00086     int i, j, k;
00087     int numFaces_dst, numEdges_dst, numLoops_dst = 0;
00088     int *vertMap, *edgeMap, *faceMap;
00089     float frac;
00090     MPoly *mpoly_dst;
00091     MLoop *ml_dst, *ml_src /*, *mloop_dst */;
00092     GHashIterator *hashIter;
00093     /* maps vert indices in old mesh to indices in new mesh */
00094     GHash *vertHash = BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_inthash,
00095                                     BLI_ghashutil_intcmp, "build ve apply gh");
00096     /* maps edge indices in new mesh to indices in old mesh */
00097     GHash *edgeHash = BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_inthash,
00098                                     BLI_ghashutil_intcmp, "build ed apply gh");
00099     GHash *edgeHash2 = BLI_ghash_new(BLI_ghashutil_inthash,
00100                                      BLI_ghashutil_intcmp, "build ed apply gh");
00101 
00102     const int numVert_src = dm->getNumVerts(dm);
00103     const int numEdge_src = dm->getNumEdges(dm);
00104     const int numPoly_src = dm->getNumPolys(dm);
00105     MPoly *mpoly_src = dm->getPolyArray(dm);
00106     MLoop *mloop_src = dm->getLoopArray(dm);
00107     MEdge *medge_src = dm->getEdgeArray(dm);
00108     MVert *mvert_src = dm->getVertArray(dm);
00109 
00110 
00111     vertMap = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*vertMap) * numVert_src, "build modifier vertMap");
00112     for (i = 0; i < numVert_src; i++) vertMap[i] = i;
00113     edgeMap = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*edgeMap) * numEdge_src, "build modifier edgeMap");
00114     for (i = 0; i < numEdge_src; i++) edgeMap[i] = i;
00115     faceMap = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*faceMap) * numPoly_src, "build modifier faceMap");
00116     for (i = 0; i < numPoly_src; i++) faceMap[i] = i;
00117 
00118     frac = (BKE_curframe(md->scene) - bmd->start) / bmd->length;
00119     CLAMP(frac, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00120 
00121     numFaces_dst = numPoly_src * frac;
00122     numEdges_dst = numEdge_src * frac;
00123 
00124     /* if there's at least one face, build based on faces */
00125     if (numFaces_dst) {
00126         MPoly *mpoly, *mp;
00127         MLoop *ml, *mloop;
00128         MEdge *medge;
00129         
00130         if (bmd->randomize) {
00131             BLI_array_randomize(faceMap, sizeof(*faceMap),
00132                                 numPoly_src, bmd->seed);
00133         }
00134 
00135         /* get the set of all vert indices that will be in the final mesh,
00136          * mapped to the new indices
00137          */
00138         mpoly = mpoly_src;
00139         mloop = mloop_src;
00140         for (i = 0; i < numFaces_dst; i++) {
00141             mp = mpoly + faceMap[i];
00142             ml = mloop + mp->loopstart;
00143 
00144             for (j=0; j<mp->totloop; j++, ml++) {
00145                 if (!BLI_ghash_haskey(vertHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(ml->v)))
00146                     BLI_ghash_insert(vertHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(ml->v),
00147                                      SET_INT_IN_POINTER(BLI_ghash_size(vertHash)));
00148             }
00149             
00150             numLoops_dst += mp->totloop;
00151         }
00152 
00153         /* get the set of edges that will be in the new mesh (i.e. all edges
00154          * that have both verts in the new mesh)
00155          */
00156         medge = medge_src;
00157         for (i = 0; i < numEdge_src; i++) {
00158             MEdge *me = medge + i;
00159 
00160             if ( BLI_ghash_haskey(vertHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(me->v1)) &&
00161                  BLI_ghash_haskey(vertHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(me->v2)))
00162             {
00163                 j = BLI_ghash_size(edgeHash);
00164                 
00165                 BLI_ghash_insert(edgeHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(j),
00166                                  SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i));
00167                 BLI_ghash_insert(edgeHash2, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i),
00168                                  SET_INT_IN_POINTER(j));
00169             }
00170         }
00171     }
00172     else if (numEdges_dst) {
00173         MEdge *medge, *me;
00174 
00175         if (bmd->randomize)
00176             BLI_array_randomize(edgeMap, sizeof(*edgeMap),
00177                                 numEdge_src, bmd->seed);
00178 
00179         /* get the set of all vert indices that will be in the final mesh,
00180          * mapped to the new indices
00181          */
00182         medge = medge_src;
00183         for (i = 0; i < numEdges_dst; i++) {
00184             me = medge + edgeMap[i];
00185 
00186             if (!BLI_ghash_haskey(vertHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(me->v1))) {
00187                 BLI_ghash_insert(vertHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(me->v1),
00188                                  SET_INT_IN_POINTER(BLI_ghash_size(vertHash)));
00189             }
00190             if (!BLI_ghash_haskey(vertHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(me->v2))) {
00191                 BLI_ghash_insert(vertHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(me->v2), SET_INT_IN_POINTER(BLI_ghash_size(vertHash)));
00192             }
00193         }
00194 
00195         /* get the set of edges that will be in the new mesh */
00196         for (i = 0; i < numEdges_dst; i++) {
00197             j = BLI_ghash_size(edgeHash);
00198             
00199             BLI_ghash_insert(edgeHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(j),
00200                              SET_INT_IN_POINTER(edgeMap[i]));
00201             BLI_ghash_insert(edgeHash2,  SET_INT_IN_POINTER(edgeMap[i]),
00202                              SET_INT_IN_POINTER(j));
00203         }
00204     }
00205     else {
00206         int numVerts = numVert_src * frac;
00207 
00208         if (bmd->randomize) {
00209             BLI_array_randomize(vertMap, sizeof(*vertMap),
00210                                 numVert_src, bmd->seed);
00211         }
00212 
00213         /* get the set of all vert indices that will be in the final mesh,
00214          * mapped to the new indices
00215          */
00216         for (i = 0; i < numVerts; i++) {
00217             BLI_ghash_insert(vertHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(vertMap[i]), SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i));
00218         }
00219     }
00220 
00221     /* now we know the number of verts, edges and faces, we can create
00222      * the mesh
00223      */
00224     result = CDDM_from_template(dm, BLI_ghash_size(vertHash),
00225                                 BLI_ghash_size(edgeHash), 0, numLoops_dst, numFaces_dst);
00226 
00227     /* copy the vertices across */
00228     for ( hashIter = BLI_ghashIterator_new(vertHash);
00229           !BLI_ghashIterator_isDone(hashIter);
00230           BLI_ghashIterator_step(hashIter)
00231           )
00232     {
00233         MVert source;
00234         MVert *dest;
00235         int oldIndex = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghashIterator_getKey(hashIter));
00236         int newIndex = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghashIterator_getValue(hashIter));
00237 
00238         source = mvert_src [oldIndex];
00239         dest = CDDM_get_vert(result, newIndex);
00240 
00241         DM_copy_vert_data(dm, result, oldIndex, newIndex, 1);
00242         *dest = source;
00243     }
00244     BLI_ghashIterator_free(hashIter);
00245     
00246     /* copy the edges across, remapping indices */
00247     for (i = 0; i < BLI_ghash_size(edgeHash); i++) {
00248         MEdge source;
00249         MEdge *dest;
00250         int oldIndex = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghash_lookup(edgeHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(i)));
00251         
00252         source = medge_src[oldIndex];
00253         dest = CDDM_get_edge(result, i);
00254         
00255         source.v1 = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghash_lookup(vertHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(source.v1)));
00256         source.v2 = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghash_lookup(vertHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(source.v2)));
00257         
00258         DM_copy_edge_data(dm, result, oldIndex, i, 1);
00259         *dest = source;
00260     }
00261 
00262     mpoly_dst = CDDM_get_polys(result);
00263     /* mloop_dst = */ ml_dst = CDDM_get_loops(result);
00264     
00265     /* copy the faces across, remapping indices */
00266     k = 0;
00267     for (i = 0; i < numFaces_dst; i++) {
00268         MPoly *source;
00269         MPoly *dest;
00270         
00271         source = mpoly_src + faceMap[i];
00272         dest = mpoly_dst + i;
00273         DM_copy_poly_data(dm, result, faceMap[i], i, 1);
00274         
00275         *dest = *source;
00276         dest->loopstart = k;
00277         
00278         DM_copy_loop_data(dm, result, source->loopstart, dest->loopstart, dest->totloop);
00279 
00280         ml_src = mloop_src + source->loopstart;
00281         for (j=0; j<source->totloop; j++, k++, ml_src++, ml_dst++) {
00282             ml_dst->v = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghash_lookup(vertHash, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(ml_src->v)));
00283             ml_dst->e = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(BLI_ghash_lookup(edgeHash2, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(ml_src->e)));
00284         }
00285     }
00286 
00287     BLI_ghash_free(vertHash, NULL, NULL);
00288     BLI_ghash_free(edgeHash, NULL, NULL);
00289     BLI_ghash_free(edgeHash2, NULL, NULL);
00290     
00291     MEM_freeN(vertMap);
00292     MEM_freeN(edgeMap);
00293     MEM_freeN(faceMap);
00294 
00295     return result;
00296 }
00297

00299 ModifierTypeInfo modifierType_Build = {
00300     /* name */              "Build",
00301     /* structName */        "BuildModifierData",
00302     /* structSize */        sizeof(BuildModifierData),
00303     /* type */              eModifierTypeType_Nonconstructive,
00304     /* flags */             eModifierTypeFlag_AcceptsMesh
00305                             | eModifierTypeFlag_AcceptsCVs,
00306     /* copyData */          copyData,
00307     /* deformVerts */       NULL,
00308     /* deformMatrices */    NULL,
00309     /* deformVertsEM */     NULL,
00310     /* deformMatricesEM */  NULL,
00311     /* applyModifier */     applyModifier,
00312     /* applyModifierEM */   NULL,
00313     /* initData */          initData,
00314     /* requiredDataMask */  NULL,
00315     /* freeData */          NULL,
00316     /* isDisabled */        NULL,
00317     /* updateDepgraph */    NULL,
00318     /* dependsOnTime */     dependsOnTime,
00319     /* dependsOnNormals */  NULL,
00320     /* foreachObjectLink */ NULL,
00321     /* foreachIDLink */     NULL,
00322     /* foreachTexLink */    NULL,
00323 };
